name: Edge Of Dawn (itch)
description:
Edge of Dawn is a Castilevania esque 2D platformer. Where you play as the man created by three gods. Ra, the blazing heat of strength, Salana, the Illuminating Light of Wisdom and Cyrus, the warm glow of courage. Battle through rooms full of evil creatures of the night to reach the mastermind behind it all Luna. A wicked power hungry witch who has casted darkness upon the land for all eternity. Will you bring light back into the world or be eaten up by the ever ensuing darkness.

______________________________________________________________________________________

Controls :

Movement : W/A/S/D

Jump: Spacebar

Attack: Left Mouse Click

Dash: Left Shift

Star Shot (Once Found) : E
